attributes.action: prohibit DC Comics from reformatting the Dandy comic into a new and horrible fortnightly format...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
stop messing with our childhoods - the dancy was fine as it was and will continue to be so!

It doesn't need to be 'Xtreme'... it just needs to be! It's a historic institution that needs to be protected and cherished. If it was a building of similar pedigree it would have listed status!

Save the Dandy! Save the world!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
